Text: How useful is this without you seeding :-((

I've been seeding it for 2 days now -- the tracker's being a pain since I started; according to Azureus there are currently 7 leechers, but TPB is showing 0, so something's not quite right.)
How long will this trial work?

At work we spoke to Apple about it (we use it extensively, but for various reasons need to keep Tiger on at least some of our machines) and were told that 1.4 will work indefinitely -- no support and no updates, but unlike previous versions it has no built-in timebomb.
Installed and ran fine on 10.4.11 today, thanks muchly for keeping this alive for those of us not on leopard yet (or those with faulty leopard disks, grr!)

A mac update disables the bootcamp beta. You need leopard to run bootcamp now. This torrent = useless

to install this version, which is expired, you must set your dates back to like... 2005. install it, and then change the dates back. :) works perfectly
